channel.title: Rapid-pkz new server (getting it online.. please help)
channel.description:
OK i need help. i ran a server bout a year ago and it was going good like 3months but i moved now i wanna make a new one but cant figure out why it wont go online(public). i didnt have this much trouble first time i did it.
ok i edited client + source how i wanted it then i made my no-ip, i made my eceptions on firewall for it, and i got uTorrent and i run in this order.: 1. utorrent (options-connection-43594- ect) 2. close utorrent 3. run no-ip (alrdy had setup) 4.run source 5.open utorrent.
then i trying putting server on rune locus and mopar status and runelocus let me but mopar says server is offline and must be online before registering here and idk what im not doing right ):
please help

item.title: Rapid-pkz new server (getting it online.. please help)
item.dc:creator: @rapid_pkz_02 rapid pkz 02
item.description:
@rapid_pkz_02 wrote:

i have vista and ill check out the portforward site to see if i can get it
thx

ight i been trying to get this server online for like 2days now.
seems like ive tried everything.
after i edited my client+ sourse i have got my server hosted on no-ip, ive made the exection for it(and port) in the firwall, im went into the 192.164.ect.ect url thing and made router accept my servers ip (w/ port 43594) and ive even tried to do the utorrent thing like in this video:

after all that this server status checker (mopar) wont let me register it because it says that it is ofline still

Read full topic

item.title: Rapid-pkz new server (getting it online.. please help)
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

UTorrent can be used to port forward, but I wouldn’t recommend it. From what I’ve heard it’s quite un reliable.

There are plenty of guides on the internet of how to portfoward properly. Try www.portforward.com.

Read full topic

item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

[quote=“rapid pkz 02, post:1, topic:390584”]OK i need help. i ran a server bout a year ago and it was going good like 3months but i moved now i wanna make a new one but cant figure out why it wont go online(public). i didnt have this much trouble first time i did it.

ok i edited client + source how i wanted it then i made my no-ip, i made my eceptions on firewall for it, and i got uTorrent and i run in this order.:

  1. utorrent (options-connection-43594- ect)
  2. close utorrent
  3. run no-ip (alrdy had setup)
    4.run source
    5.open utorrent.

then i trying putting server on google and mopar status and google let me but mopar says server is offline and must be online before registering here and idk what im not doing right ):

please help[/quote]
i dont believe you can portforward using utorrent do you know your login for your router? try doing it that way instead.
